author: Gemini
description: Synchronize guild membership using Discord Embeds and OCR.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores Discord user IDs and in-game names in a Google Sheet configured by server admins. Data is only stored when application forms are processed or OCR updates are triggered.
install_msg:
GuildOps is installed. Use `[p]opset` to configure it.

**IMPORTANT:** This cog requires Tesseract OCR to be installed on your system for image processing.
Ubuntu/Debian: `sudo apt-get install tesseract-ocr`
MacOS: `brew install tesseract`
Windows: Download from https://github.com/UB-Mannheim/tesseract/wiki
name: GuildOps
